title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard

Highlights
- Compact 60% layout with 61 keys for maximum mouse space and clean setups.
- Linear Red mechanical switches: quiet, smooth, and fast with soft key travel.
- Hot-swappable sockets for easy switch changes without soldering.
- Durable switch lifespan up to 50 million keypresses.
- Vibrant RGB with 20 presets, adjustable brightness and effect speed.
- Advanced software support: customize lighting, create macros, set keybindings and shortcuts.
- Ideal for FPS gamers seeking precision and desk space efficiency.

Overview
The Redragon K617 Fizz condenses performance into a sleek 60% form factor, giving FPS gamers more room to maneuver while keeping essential commands at your fingertips. The two-tone white and grey keycaps deliver a clean, modern aesthetic that fits gaming and productivity setups alike.

Performance Switches
Equipped with Linear Red switches, the K617 provides a smooth, quiet keystroke with rapid actuation—perfect for clutch moments in competitive play. Hot-swappable sockets let you swap compatible mechanical switches in seconds, tailoring feel and sound without soldering. Each switch is rated for up to 50 million presses for long-term reliability.

Immersive RGB
Choose from 20 dynamic RGB presets to match your mood or game. Fine-tune brightness and flow speed directly or via software to craft unique lighting effects and design modes that sync with your style.

Pro Software Control
Unlock deeper customization with Redragon’s Pro driver:
- Create and edit macros for complex in-game actions.
- Remap keys and set layered keybindings.
- Assign shortcuts and profile switching.
- Design lighting modes and effects.
Software link: redragonshop.

Built for Competitive Play
- 60% layout optimizes mouse space for low-sensitivity FPS tracking.
- Compact design supports efficient workspace management.
- Wired connection ensures stable, low-latency input.

Specifications
- Layout: 60%
- Keys: 61
- Connectivity: Wired
- Switch Type: Linear Red (quiet mechanical, soft travel)
- Hot-Swappable: Yes
- Switch Lifespan: Up to 50 million presses
- Keycap Colors: White and Grey
- RGB: 20 presets, adjustable brightness and speed
- Software: Pro driver with customizable lighting, macros, keybindings, and shortcuts

In the Box
- Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard
- Detachable cable (if applicable)
- User guide

Who It’s For
- FPS gamers who need extra mouse space and fast, quiet switches.
- Desk minimalists and creators who want a compact, customizable board with pro-grade software control.

Elevate your aim, streamline your setup, and customize every key with the Redragon K617 Fizz.
